title: StayinFront Spotlights Emerging Markets Retail Execution Platform With Sponsorship of 2015 Consumer Goods Technology Emerging Markets Forum
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 4:00 AM   StayinFront 
FAIRFIELD, NJ -- (Marketwired) -- 09/03/15 -- StayinFront , a global leader in mobile SaaS retail execution solutions, today announced that it will sponsor the Consumer Goods Technology (CGT) Magazine's 2015 Emerging Markets Forum and participate in the technology roundtable session. 
StayinFront's presence at the event reinforces the company's commitment to emerging markets and helping multinational consumer brands manage their sales and marketing operations globally, across all routes to market. The exclusive two-day event, which takes place in Fort Lauderdale, FL, Sept. 16 - 18, is designed to bring senior level consumer goods executives together for an opportunity to share experiences, insights and best globalization practices for multinational brands. Session topics will range from discussions on logistics, retail, and marketing issues to panels on regional best practices and technology. 
Recently recognized by Gartner, StayinFront's highly configurable mobile selling platform, StayinFront TouchCGÂ® , can be tailored to the unique needs of emerging markets as well as standardized globally. This enables multinational brands to deploy one solution that addresses local needs and allows them to measure key performance indicators across their worldwide stores. 
"StayinFront's solutions support the business models and requirements of both developed and emerging markets providing companies with greater visibility into their sales channels, along with the tools to do more, know more and sell more in every market," said Thomas Buckley, StayinFront CEO. "CGT's Emerging Markets forum is an important event for anyone in the consumer goods industry looking to gain insight into the groundbreaking tools and innovative ideas being implemented in emerging markets. 
About Consumer Goods Technology Consumer Goods Technology , an integrated media brand, is the leading resource for consumer goods executives looking to improve business performance. Delivering content in print, online and face-to-face, CGT reaches an audience of more than 76,000 consumer goods executives working at the intersection of business and technology ranging from managers and directors to VPs and CIOs. CGT also covers business and technology trends in all major segments of the consumer goods sector, including Food, Beverage, Packaged Goods, Health & Beauty, Consumer Electronics, Apparel and Footwear. For more information on CGT, visit www.consumergoods.com 
About StayinFront StayinFront is a leading global provider of mobile, cloud-based field force effectiveness and customer relationship management solutions for consumer goods and life sciences organizations. Companies of all sizes, in over 50 countries, use StayinFront software to streamline sales operations and reduce the complexity, time and expense associated with field efforts. StayinFront products provide companies with timely, accurate field data and insight, enabling field reps and management to do more, know more and sell more. Headquartered in Fairfield, NJ, USA, StayinFront has additional offices in Chicago, the United Kingdom, Turkey, Ireland, India, Australia, Singapore and New Zealand.
